3: Clang—!
Your strength has left quite an impression.
(Pants)
Now, quit fooling around. Show me what you're truly made of.
Well then... as you wish...
Woosh—!
The surface of the ocean begins to surge again...
The Narwhal's long horn breaks the surface as he reappears before everyone.
Countless Corrupted cover the Narwhal as he wails in pain.
Derek...! Hurry... get out of here!
Why...
You don't think... I can beat her?
But you haven't seen my true power—
You... want to... save them...
And you hope... I will, too?
Alpha, observing as this unfolds before her, sheaths her weapon.
Aren't you going to keep fighting?
I... have a proposition.
